p: Studies analyzing the flavonoidsâ€™ cardioprotective effects reported an inverse association between high doses of flavonoids and coronary heart incidence and mortality [ 63]. The role of quercitrin and of the aglycones luteolin and apigenin in heart-related diseases prevention was assessed in an extensive study [ 64]. Rutin reduced cardiac hypertrophy and, consequently, cardiac remodeling [ 65]. Also, isoquercitrin has an important role as an antioxidant in myocardial oxidative stress [ 66].
